types.name: Semi-automatic
types.description: Semi-automatic espresso machines offer just the right amount of control over how your espresso is made at home. While they may look different, the basic functionality of a semi-automatic espresso machine includes a boiler, a portafilter and a switch or lever to perform the extraction. Youâ€™ll still grind and tamp your espresso (or insert an espresso pod), start the extraction and then steam or froth your milk as necessary.

types.name: Superautomatic
types.description: Too bleary-eyed to grind, tamp and steam your own espresso shot in the morning? Let a superautomatic espresso machine do it for you, saving you time, effort and clean up! At the push of a button, these espresso machines create consistent coffee and espresso drinks like lattes and cappuccinos.

types.name: Commercial
types.description: Whether it is for a bookstore that provides espresso to browsing customers or the busiest drive-through espresso stand on the block, we have a wide range of commercial grinders that we can custom fit to your needs.

types.name: Home Espresso Grinders
types.description: Every dynamite cup of espresso starts with a dynamite grind. Consistency, texture, size - it all matters. Whether you are new to the world of espresso or have been making the perfect cup of coffee for as long as you can remember, fresh coffee grounds are the first step.

types.name: Batch Brew Grinders
types.description: Take your pick from our curated collection that includes everything from entry-level coffee grinders to precision-designed espresso grinders.

types.name: Commercial Grinders
types.description: Whether it is for a bookstore that provides espresso to browsing customers or the busiest drive-through espresso stand on the block, we have a wide range of commercial grinders that we can custom fit to your needs.

types.name: Coffee Makers
types.description: Traditional coffee makers magically mix hot water and fresh coffee grounds, but many variables effect how your cup of coffee ultimately turns out.

types.name: Single Cup Brewers
types.description: If you just need one, these are the brewers for you.
